summary: An unassuming office worker is arrested and stands trial, but he is never made aware of his charges.
cast: Anthony Perkins|Arnoldo Foà|Jess Hahn|Billy Kearns|Madeleine Robinson|Jeanne Moreau|Maurice Teynac|Naydra Shore|Suzanne Flon|Raoul Delfosse|Jean-Claude Rémoleux|Max Buchsbaum|Carl Studer|Max Haufler|Romy Schneider|Fernand Ledoux|Akim Tamiroff|Elsa Martinelli|Thomas Holtzmann|Wolfgang Reichmann|William Chappell|Michael Lonsdale|Orson Welles|Guy Grosso|Paola Mori
title: El proceso
